author: kkotov
body:
1. As requested by Giacomo, the tag name can now be modified via script's parameter (as opposed to local installation + code modifications).
2. The L1T O2O helper writers can now be instructed to write O2O or offline records via a config parameter.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_9_0_X #17641 (original by @kkotov).
Please wait for a new IB (12 to 24H) before requesting to test this PR.
title: L1T O2O tag base handle + record name configurability in helper tools
